Type.Name: ResponseType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ResponseType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: This enumeration contains the response signals that are emitted by a .
Docs.remarks: When a button in a is pressed, a response signal is emitted with a response ID. While positive responses are entirely user-defined, the enumeration (all the members have values less than zero) could be also be used instead for convience.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType Accept = int32(-3)

Docs.summary: Convenience response type to be used in the constructors of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType Apply = int32(-10)

Docs.summary: Convenience response type to be used in the constructors of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType Cancel = int32(-6)

Docs.summary: Convenience response type to be used in the constructors of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType Close = int32(-7)

Docs.summary: Convenience response type to be used in the constructors of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType DeleteEvent = int32(-4)

Docs.summary: This is returned when the dialog is deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType Help = int32(-11)

Docs.summary: Convenience response type to be used in the constructors of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType No = int32(-9)

Docs.summary: Convenience response type to be used in the constructors of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType None = int32(-1)

Docs.summary: This is returned if a response widget has no response ID, or has been programmatically hidden or destroyed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType Ok = int32(-5)

Docs.summary: Convenience response type to be used in the constructors of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType Reject = int32(-2)

Docs.summary: Convenience response type to be used in the constructors of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.ResponseType Yes = int32(-8)

Docs.summary: Convenience response type to be used in the constructors of the class.
